3. Annotations¶

Annotations let you go beyond what’s in the text, and extend Orange Textable’s analytic capacities from textual content to user-provided interpretative information and metadata.

  • 3.1. Annotations and their uses
  • 3.2. Annotating by merging
  • 3.3. Converting XML markup to annotations
  • 3.4. Tagging table rows with annotations
  • 3.5. Merging units with annotations
  • 3.6. Annotation-based selection
